title: Does John Kerry have multiple houses and yachts?
subtitle: In late 2020, an aide-memoire on the next United States climate envoy, based on news from the 2004 presidential election cycle, appeared to be available.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: John Kerry, selected by President-elect Joe Biden of the United States to serve as climate envoy, owns six houses, two sisters, 12 cars and a private jet.
